name: Forum Energii
memberOrga: We do not have member organizations. We have working partners in Brussels - Regulatory Assistance Project.
goal: Forum Energii is a think tank, focused on forging the foundation for a clean, innovative, safe and efficient energy sector based on data and analysis. It is a fact-based, professional, trustworthy partner for dialog and a knowledge hub for the energy sector in Poland and in the region.
euInitiatives: Clean Energy for all Europeans, Energy Union, new electricity market design, decarbonization, capacity markets, regional energy cooperation, power market transformation, electricity market, renewables, sector coupling, heating sector.
